Class: Kalix

kalix. Kalix

new Kalix( [options])

Kalix service.

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
options module:kalix.KalixOptions <optional>

The options for starting the service.

Methods

addComponent(components)

Add one or more components to this Kalix service.

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
components module:kalix~Component <repeatable>

The components to add.
Returns:

this Kalix service.

Type
module:kalix.Kalix

shutdown()

Shut down the Kalix service.

start( [binding])

Start the Kalix service.

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
binding module:kalix.ServiceBinding <optional>

optional address/port binding to start the service on.
Returns:

A Promise of the bound port for this service.

Type
Promise.<number>

tryShutdown(callback)

Shut down the Kalix service.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
callback module:kalix.Kalix~shutdownCallback

shutdown callback, accepting possible error

Callback for tryShutdown, accepting possible error.

Name Type Argument Description
